content.rendered:
[vc_row height_ratio=”100″ padding_top_multiplier=”6x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”6x” rc_heading_color=”light” rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image=”9387″ rc_bg_position=”center-top” rc_bg_color_overlay=”dark” rc_bg_opacity_overlay=”30″][vc_column width=”1/2″ rc_heading_color=”light”]

Become a Webkey partner today!
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Already working with Webkey
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Webkey for Digital signage
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Signed Webkey APK
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height_ratio=”100″ desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide” tablet_sm_height_ratio=”80″ mobile_height_ratio=”100″ min_height=”450″ rc_font_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column width=”1/2″ vertical_content_position=”middle” rc_heading_color=”dark” tablet_sm_width=”2-3″]
Become a Webkey partner today!
[vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in-left” animation_delay=”1200″ animation_duration=”slow”]

At Webkey, we are constantly looking for partnerships with android device manufacturers; with a system signed APK, your devices become fully capable of getting the maximum performance of the Webkey Features.

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in-left” animation_delay=”1200″ animation_duration=”slow”]

The need for remotely controlling a device fleet has increased significantly recently. As an android device manufacturer, you can now offer your customers the possibility to seamlessly roll out such an application simply by having a system signed APK for Webkey. A minimum effort step from your side, that can give your customers access to a better service, without having to root their devices. Get in touch with us and give yourself the market advantage!

Find out more about the advantages of partnering with Webkey.[/vc_column_text]

Contact us
[vc_column_text]Hubspot?[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image_type=”parallax” tablet_sm_width=”1-3″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”4x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”3x” desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide”][vc_column]
Already working with Webkey:
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”3x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”2x” desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide”][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide”][vc_column][vc_row_inner columns_gap=”50″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Unitech, Taiwan

Unitech is a Taiwanese barcode scanner manufacturer. For security reasons they were looking for a partner that integrates with their MDM solution. Webkey has provided Unitech with a server based remote access to their devices, that now runs on their local access network.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Brooklyn, New York

With speakers all across the US in reatail stores, they wanted to save time and energy on maintenance and IT management. Webkey has helped Activaire integrate their own with solution for a centrally managed IT maintenance system.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Board of York School, Canada

The board leverages Webkey to centrally control their educational devices (tablets, interactive boards) in K-12 institutes.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Digimevo, Spain

Digimevo spain displays educational content in medical facilities across Spain. They found it difficulty to maintain all their devices in their fleet. Webkey has been helped them to control the management and maintenance of their Android devices centrally.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Adload

Adload inc specializes in displaying ads on the backdoors of trucks across all roadways. To maximize the reach of their ads, they need to have accurate location information of their devices. They choose Webkey to make sure the ads are tailored to the location they are relevant in.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Scoops

Scoops provides devices for digital signage in many retail facilities. They needed to maintain and manage their devices centrally, but they had to bring all of their devices on-board quickly. Webkey helped them by providing them with auto-enrollment of devices (one time enrollment of multiple devices to one account), helping them to take control of their devices more efficiently.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Digitronix

Digitronix is a France based digital signage company. With geographical expansion, they wanted to make sure they retain control over their devices in a central way. They chose Webkey to be their partner in building a centrally managed maintenance supply chain.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Evaret

Evaret provides a number of different IT solutions, among them digital signage. They wanted to make sure that the maintenance of these is as efficient as possible. Webkey has helped them build a resilient way to manage their Android devices.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”2x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”2x” desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide”][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
